These devices build collagen and elastin and reduce wrinkles. Treat each area up to 5 times a week for 8 weeks. After 8 weeks, continue maintenance treatments 1 to 3 times a week.
These devices kill acne-causing bacteria on the surface of the skin and in your pores. Treat each area where you have acne or are prone to acne for 3 to 4 minutes. Blue light can be used daily.

Blue light kills acne-causing bacteria on the surface of the skin and in the pores. Red light promotes healing and reduces inflammation and redness. Treat your skin using the red and blue sides of the device according to the instructions that came with your device.
